description: The Echo Group provides a federally certified Behavioral Health Electronic Medical Record, as well as medical billing and regulatory reporting capacity. The VHR Skill provides an interactive verbal querying capacity that enables clinical staff to ask questions about their schedule and productivity.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, Ask v.h.r. for my next appointment
What were my cash receipts yesterday
name: VHR
shortDescription: A convenience tool for staff members to access their schedules and productivity information from The Echo Group's services
